00010 bool cgi_var( const Cgicc *cgi, const string &name, string &val ) {
00011     const_form_iterator fi = cgi->getElement(name);
00012     if( fi != cgi->getElements().end() ) {
00013             val = fi->getValue();
00014             return true;
00015     }
00016     val = "";
00017     return false;
00018 }

00036 bool cgi_ck( const vector<HTTPCookie> & cks, const string & ck, string & v ) {
00037     vector<HTTPCookie>::const_iterator ptr = cks.begin(), end = cks.end();
00038     for( ; ptr!=end; ptr++ ) {
00039             if( stringsAreEqual(ptr->getName(), ck) ) {
00040                     v = ptr->getValue();
00041                     return true;
00042             }
00043     }
00044     v = "";
00045     return false;
00046 }

00051 bool cgi_ck( const vector<HTTPCookie> & cks, const string & ck, HTTPCookie & v ) {
00052     vector<HTTPCookie>::const_iterator ptr = cks.begin(), end = cks.end();
00053     for( ; ptr!=end; ptr++ ) {
00054             if( stringsAreEqual(ptr->getName(), ck) ) {
00055                     v = *ptr;
00056                     return true;
00057             }
00058     }
00059     return false;
00060 }
00064 HTTPCookie *cgi_ck(vector<HTTPCookie> & cks, const string & ck ) {
00065     vector<HTTPCookie>::iterator ptr = cks.begin(), end = cks.end();
00066     for( ; ptr!=end; ptr++ )
00067             if( stringsAreEqual(ptr->getName(), ck) )
00068                     return &*ptr;
00069     return NULL;
00070 }

00075 void cookies_cp( vector<HTTPCookie> & dest, const vector<HTTPCookie> &src ) {
00076     dest.reserve(dest.size()+src.size()+15);
00077     vector<HTTPCookie>::const_iterator ptr = src.begin(), end = src.end();
00078     for( ; ptr!=end; ++ptr )
00079             dest.push_back(*ptr);
00080 }
